meanings.definition: A mother or a female parent.
meanings.sent1: My mamma makes the best cookies in town.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my mamma at the park.
meanings.sent3: When my mamma sings, the birds outside join in!
meanings.sent4: Her love enveloped me like a warm hug from mamma.
meanings.sent5: The image of my mamma's smile is etched in my heart.

meanings.definition: A mammary gland, especially when referring to a female animal.
meanings.sent1: The mamma of the cow provides milk for her calf.
meanings.sent2: The vet checked the mamma of the cat during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The kitten playfully poked at the mamma of its mother.
meanings.sent4: The mamma of the elephant was massive and impressive.
meanings.sent5: The mamma of the dog was swollen with milk after giving birth.

meanings.definition: A mature female friend or companion.
meanings.sent1: My mamma always gives me good advice when I need it.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy going shopping with my mamma on weekends.
meanings.sent3: At the party, my mamma was the life of the dance floor!
meanings.sent4: She is not just my colleague; she is also my mamma at work.
meanings.sent5: My mamma is like a guiding star, always there when I need her.
